menu.label: Provide an action list
menu.prompt: What is a list of actions I can take to improve my mental wellbeing?

menu.label: Practice mindfulness exercises
menu.prompt: What are some mindfulness exercises I can try to enhance my mental wellbeing?

menu.label: Develop a healthy sleep routine
menu.prompt: How can I establish a healthy sleep routine to improve my mental wellbeing?

menu.label: Engage in physical activity
menu.prompt: What types of physical activities can I do to boost my mental wellbeing?

menu.label: Maintain social connections
menu.prompt: How can I maintain and develop social connections to enhance my mental wellbeing?

menu.label: Manage stress
menu.prompt: What are some effective stress management techniques that can help improve my mental wellbeing?

menu.label: Explain therapy options
menu.prompt: What are some therapy options that could help improve my mental wellbeing?

menu.label: Give an example of self-care
menu.prompt: Can you provide an example of a self-care activity that could boost my mental wellbeing?
